element.content: Delicious and healthy cereal bars made from quinoa, great source of essential amino acids, and purple corn that contributes antioxidant properties. Enjoy this bar free of sugar and sweetened with yacon syrup.
Instant mix based on cacao, purple corn, quinoa and flavored with algarrobo. Try this highly nutritional blend anytime or at breakfast to boost your day.
